author: jericho
msg: - Print the HTTP response messsage and status code for HttpException.
- By using this debug message, you can notice that some servers don't
return the http response with its version.
HTTP Exception: Incorrect server protocol : <!DOCTYPE, Status Code: -1

author: jericho
msg: - It could be happened to fail to reopen the socket after twice IOException. (like traffic jam)
What If socket is not null, next time, it could keep to have errors on the HttpClient instance.
So, make sure that the socket is null.
